feature.label: Eclipse SQL Explorer
feature.description:
SQL Explorer is a thin SQL client for querying and exploring JDBC Compliant databases. Changes in 3.6.1: +. fixed: result set column labels sometimes ignored alias names (select some_col as label, ...) +. added: replace ${workspace_loc} in jdbc driver URLs +. fixed list drivers bug with file names containing spaces etc. https://sourceforge.net/projects/eclipsesql/forums/forum/450662/topic/3947666
SR5_P1: +. fixed NPE on null values in CLOB data
